title: Fade Box
description: A simple box that fades in and scales up on hover.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses CSS transitions to smoothly change the opacity and scale of the box when you hover over it.

title: Pulse Box
description: A box that pulses with a color animation.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses a CSS keyframe animation to create a pulsing color change effect.

title: Glow Text
description: Text that glows and intensifies on hover.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This uses the CSS text-shadow property to create a glowing effect around the text, which intensifies on hover.

title: Pressed Button
description: A button that gives a 3D press-down effect when clicked.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This uses the :active pseudo-class to change the button's transform and box-shadow, creating a satisfying press effect.

title: 3D Lift Card
description: A card that lifts and tilts in 3D space on hover.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses CSS 3D transforms and perspective to create a card that appears to lift off the page on hover.

title: Cursor Particle Trail
description: A canvas-based particle trail that follows the cursor's movement inside the card.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses an HTML5 Canvas and a JavaScript animation loop (requestAnimationFrame) to draw particles at the cursor's position, creating a trailing effect. The animation only runs on hover via the embed-controller.

title: Glitch Text
description: A CSS-only text effect that creates a digital glitching and distortion illusion.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses two pseudo-elements (::before and ::after) as copies of the text. A keyframe animation rapidly changes the `clip-path` of these pseudo-elements, revealing different slices of them with colored text-shadows to create the glitch illusion.
